name: Ulead GIF Animator File
summary: Learn about .UGA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create UGA files, select File → Save As, choose your save location, name your file, and save in the UGA format.
In the trial version of GIF Animator 5, sample UGA files can be found in the following directory C:\​Program Files (x86)\​Ulead Systems\​Ulead GIF Animator 5 Trial\​Samples.
NOTE: Ulead was acquired by Corel in 2006 and the GIF Animator tool was discontinued.

description: Project file created by Ulead GIF Animator, a GIF animation tool for web pages, presentations, etc.; contains a GIF animation project; project features held within the file include objects, text, and shape insertion; creates .GIF files.
